LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_CargoBox.label: payload cabinet
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_CargoBox.description: An attached metal rack capable of storing payloads on a walker frame.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_InfraredSensor.label: infrared sensor
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_InfraredSensor.description: An additional external optical sensor provides some night operation capabilities without modifying the frame itself, and provides aiming assistance.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_PulseShield.label: pulse shield
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_PulseShield.description: A miniaturized shield module used on a small scale in the colonial fleet. Its fast charging speed allows it to completely absorb low-caliber projectiles bursts or intercept a fatal projectile.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Shield.label: solid shield
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Shield.description: A composite armor shield mounted on the dragoon frame. Although it is a bit heavy, it can effectively resist the damage caused by large-caliber fragments and anti-material rifle bullets.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_WorkArm.label: work arm
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_WorkArm.description: A module hung on the left arm of the frame, contains a eletric motor clamp and positioning device, which can achieve the same dexterity as a human hand to a certain extent.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_CargoBox.label: payload cabinet
LanguageData.DMS_Module_CargoBox.description: An attached metal rack capable of storing payloads on a walker frame.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_InfraredSensor.label: infrared sensor
LanguageData.DMS_Module_InfraredSensor.description: An additional external optical sensor provides some night operation capabilities without modifying the frame itself, and provides aiming assistance.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_PulseShield.label: pulse shield
LanguageData.DMS_Module_PulseShield.description: A miniaturized pulse shield module used in the colonial fleet, only used on a fairly small scale due to cost considerations. Its fast charging speed allows it to completely absorb low-caliber projectiles bursts or intercept a fatal projectile.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_Shield.label: ballistic shield
LanguageData.DMS_Module_Shield.description: A composite armor shield mounted on the dragoon frame. Although it is a bit heavy, it can effectively resist the damage caused by large-caliber fragments and anti-material rifle bullets.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_WorkArm.label: work arm
LanguageData.DMS_Module_WorkArm.description: A module hung on the left arm of the frame, contains a eletric motor clamp and positioning device, which can achieve the same dexterity as a human hand to a certain extent.
